Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom for your business needs. In regard to your inquiry, LegalZoom can assist you in obtaining a Certificate of Good Standing for your business.
For your reference, general information regarding Certificates of Good Standing has been outlined below. If you would like to get specific, detailed information on your personal situation, please contact a Business Formation Specialist at the phone number listed below. By speaking with a Specialist will be able to assist with answering further questions, as well as building a customized package to best benefit your needs.
The Certificate of Good Standing is an official document from the Secretary of State indicating that the entity has submitted all required filings to the state, has paid all required state fees, and is in good standing as of the current date.
For your convenience, the relevant pricing is included below.
CERTIFICATE OF GOOD STANDING Rush - $75.00 + state fee - (10-15 business days)* Standard - $45.00 + state fee + shipping - (20-30 business days)
To view the state fee for your state, please follow the "GET STARTED" link below and select your state from the drop-down list.
GET STARTED http://www.legalzoom.com/additional-business-services/certificates-of-good-standing.html
* Some states may have delays which affect the listed turnaround time. To determine if your state is affected, please contact a Specialist at the phone number listed below.
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom with your business inquiries, and we look forward to assisting you. If you have any additional questions, please feel free to contact us by phone at the phone number listed below.
Best regards,
{!User.FirstName} (800) 773-0888 x{!User.Extension} www.legalzoom.com
